thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hain Celestial Group Reports Q2 Adj Shr of $0.41

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hain Celestial Group Reports Q2 Adj Shr of $0.41
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Hain Celestial Group Inc:
* HAIN CELESTIAL REPORTS SECOND QUARTER FISCAL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q2 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.41 * Q2 SALES ROSE 5 PERCENT TO $775.2 MILLION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.45 * SEES FISCAL YEAR 2018 NET SALES OF $2.967 BILLION TO $3.036 BILLION
* EXPLORES DIVESTITURE OF HAIN PURE PROTEIN * REITERATED ITS NET SALES OUTLOOK AND UPDATED ITS ADJUSTED EPS AND ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.42, REVENUE VIEW $775.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* HAIN CELESTIAL - SEES FISCAL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EPS OF $1.64 TO $1.75, INCLUDES AN $.08 TO $.09 BENEFIT DUE TO TAX REFORM
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.65, REVENUE VIEW $2.99 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
